name: Turtank

abilities.name: Aquatic
abilities.desc: Increase the possessor's Water-type moves' power to 50%.

abilities.name: Tough Shell (Secret)
abilities.desc: Prevent critical hit from opponents's moves.

description: Turtank possess a stronger and sturdy shell, allowing them to defend against powerful attacks from their enemies. At the same time, sharp spikes from their shell can be used as the main weapon if they ever feel like retaliating.

moves_level.name: Tackle
moves_level.effect: Charge at the opponent with a full-body tackle.

moves_level.name: Bite
moves_level.effect: Bite the opponent with vicious fangs. This move has a 20% chance to reduce the target's Defense stat.

moves_level.name: Barrier
moves_level.effect: Create a barrier to reduce damage from physical attacks for 5 turns.

moves_level.name: Water Bomb
moves_level.effect: Attack the opponent with a strong blast of water. This move has a 20% chance of leaving the target in confusion.

moves_level.name: Shield
moves_level.effect: Create a shield to reduce damage from special attacks for 5 turns.

moves_level.name: Iron Wall
moves_level.effect: Harden the body like an iron wall to sharply raise the user's Defense stat.

moves_level.name: Rainfall
moves_level.effect: Summon a heavy rain that falls for 5 turns. The rain powers up Water-type moves by 50% and lowers the power of Fire-type moves by 50%.

moves_level.name: Aqua Jet
moves_level.effect: Lunge at the target like a jet. This move deals double damage if the user is under the water.

moves_level.name: Heavy Slam
moves_level.effect: Slam into the target with a heavy body. The more the user outweights the target, the greater the move's power.

moves_tutor.name: Guard
moves_tutor.effect: Guard upcoming attack(s), but reduce success rate by 50% if used consecutively with any other evasion moves.

moves_tutor.name: Rest
moves_tutor.effect: Rest for 2 turns. Each turn restores the user's HP by 50% and Stamina by 25%. This move also removes all status condition.

moves_tutor.name: Shell Break
moves_tutor.effect: Break out of the shell to drastically raise the user's Speed stat, but lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense stats.

moves_tutor.name: Submerge
moves_tutor.effect: Dive under the water and attack the next turn. The user becomes untargetable by all non-Electric typed moves during this turn.

moves_tutor.name: Powerball
moves_tutor.effect: Roll towards the opponent like a powerball. If it misses, the user is hurt instead for 25% of the maximum HP.
